subject: Re: [junit] need help
msgSnippet: ... Don t. Programmer Tests should run independently. Failure of one test should not make another test fail. Only incorrect production code should make a test
messageBody:
>So said Mukund Patel on 2003-05-08 --------------------
>Hi,
>
>How can I take the value of variable of my tested class in other testcase
>( test function ) which is updated in my another testcase.

Don't. Programmer Tests should run independently. Failure of one test should not make another test fail. Only incorrect production code should make a test fail.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
